abstract: A reviewer continues to use a few of the many apps that go through his hands. Here are some that stood out.
snippet: A reviewer continues to use a few of the many apps that go through his hands. Here are some that stood out.
lead_paragraph: WRITING this feature once a week means I get to experiment with thousands of apps every year. I’ve tested around 3,000 apps in the last 12 months, including apps in new categories like video webcasting and Apple Watch apps, and I’ve seen a surge in short-term vacation rental apps, plus increasingly minimalist graphics across all categories.

headline.main: Video Feature: Some Favorite Apps of 2015
headline.print_headline: A Roundup of Favorite, Sticky New Apps of 2015
